name: Butano Fighter
overview: This is Butano Fighter! Stay alive while you shoot at everything that moves! What else do you need? The full source code and creative commons assets of this Game Boy Advance game are included with Butano engine. BTW, the latest release (built with Butano 6.7.0) allows to enable or disable rumble in the title menu. More info: https://gvaliente.itch.io/butano-fighter
